modName: Purity patch for Audio Overhaul Skyrim 2
summary: This is a small patch i have made for Audio Overhaul Skyrim 2 and Purity.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]ATTENTION:THIS FILE IS NOW OUTDATED!!! AOS 2 INCLUDES A NEW UPDATED PATCH! [u]THIS PATCH ONLY WORKS FOR AOS 2.2 NOT THE NEW 2.5  VERSION[/u][/size][/color][/b]

This fixes the region and weather data conflicts between AOS2 and Purity (Laast's new weather and lighting overhaul).

Make sure to load the patch after Audio Overhaul and also Purity.

Make sure you have this patch loaded after purity!! Put purity at the very end of your load order, then place this patch after purity! These need to be at the very end this is very important!

Credits go to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1213768][size=3]Laast[/size][/url] for making Purity
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/291708][size=3]LoRd KoRn[/size][/url] for Audio Overhaul Skyrim 2
Sharlikran for TES5Edit
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6794116]keithinhanoi[/url] for help with the patch:)[/size]
Bethesda for this amazing game they have created :)
author: colinswrath

files.name: AOS 2.2-Purity Patch
files.changelogHtml: Final Version- Fixes two different wind gust sounds playing at the same time during snow storms.
